title: DAX Fridays! #172: LEFT, RIGHT, LEN, SEARCH - Split text by character in DAX
excerpt: In today's video, I will show you how to split text by a character using DAX and why this search error happens and how to solve it: The search Text provided to function 'SEARCH' could not be found in the given text.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE
